code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import productImage from'../../assets/image/shop/RWK-tshirt--black.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Shop=()=>{const products=[{id:1,image:productImage,title:"RWK Black T-Shirt",buyLink:"https://buy.stripe.com/test_aEU2aPfradAv9ck5kk"},{id:2,image:productImage,title:"RWK White T-Shirt",buyLink:"https://buy.stripe.com/test_aEU2aPfradAv9ck5kk"},{id:3,image:productImage,title:"RWK Grey T-Shirt",buyLink:"https://buy.stripe.com/test_aEU2aPfradAv9ck5kk"},{id:4,image:productImage,title:"RWK Blue T-Shirt",buyLink:"https://buy.stripe.com/test_aEU2aPfradAv9ck5kk"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"shop",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-container main-container--shop",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Our Shop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"shop__container",children:products.map((product,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shop__product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"shop__image",src:product.image,alt:product.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"shop__title",children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:product.buyLink,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",children:"Buy"})})]},index))})]})});};export default Shop;
